title: Beef and Herb Khoresh
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons Olive Oil', '1 Large Onion - chopped', '450g Stewing Beef - cubed', '2 teaspoons Ground Turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon', '600ml Cold Water', '25g Fresh Parsley - chopped', '25g Fresh Chives - chopped', '400g tin Red Kidney Beans - drained', 'juice of 1 Lemon']
